tenant_id.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

actions.name: Create flavor with access list
actions.description: Creates a flavor with access list.

actions.name: List flavors with access list
actions.description: Lists flavors with access list information.

tenant_id.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

actions.name: Show flavor details with access list
actions.description: Shows details for a specified flavor. Includes access list information.

tenant_id.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

actions.name: Add flavor access to tenant
actions.description:
Adds flavor access to a specified
 tenant and flavor.
 
 Specify the add_tenant_access action and the tenant_id in the request body.

actions.name: Remove flavor access from tenant
actions.description:
Removes the specified flavor access from a specified tenant and
 flavor.
 
 
 Specify the remove_tenant_access action and the
 tenant_id in the request body.

tenant_id.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

actions.name: List flavors with details and access list
actions.description: Lists flavors with details. Includes access list information.
